rules_text:
When Sashimi Bludgeoner enters the battlefield, create a Food token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: [i]“What? You said you wanted a raw fish.”[/i]
